title: notes
text:
This is a Quarto website used for various things, including collating notes for my CCNP ENARSI exam
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.

title: Logging
text:
Syslog

General Notes

Used to manage system logs and alerts
Can be stored locally, sent to vty, console lines, or forwarded to an external syslog server
Logging levels:

Emergency: 0

Alert: 1

Critical: 2

Error: 3

Warning: 4

Notice: 5

Informational: 6

Debug: 7





Useful show commands

show logging — Shows information on local and external syslog



Standard Syslog Config
```shell logging buffered 90000 # Increase local logging buffer size logging  service timestamps debug datetime localtime show-timezone msec service timestamps log datetime localtime show-timezone msec logging trap warning # includes this level of message and all lower levels logging source-interface loopback0 exit ! show logging
